general_synopsis: Low 250 miles west of Rockall 965 losing its identity

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 6 to gale 8. In northeast, cyclonic 4 to 6.
Sea state
In southwest, very rough, becoming rough later. in northeast, moderate or rough, occasionally very rough at first.
Weather
In southwest, sleet. In northeast, fair.
Visibility
In southwest, moderate or poor. In northeast, good.
